catalogue.name: Heavy duty impact wrench in lightweight package with reversing mechanism and 1/2" force adjustment(5
catalogue.description: The pneumatic impact wrench is designed for use in assembly shops of enterprises and at car service stations, and can also be successfully used in a home auto repair shop. Powered by compressed air from the shop line or from a powerful compressor, the pneumatic impact wrench with reverser facilitates and speeds up operations related to the assembly and disassembly of various types of threaded connections during assembly and disassembly work. Made of durable ABS plastic, the shortened and lightweight tool body with a total weight of no more than 2 kg allows it to be used in conditions of limited working space. The adjustable torque of 550 Nm is enough to cope with heavily rusted connections during disassembly, and to provide the required tightening torque of nuts during assembly of mechanisms. Pneumatic impact wrench with reverse and force adjustment is connected to the compressor with a hose with a diameter of 8 mm. Square seat 1/2''; Maximum torque - 550 Nm; Number of revolutions - 7500 rpm; Working pressure - 6.3 bar; Air consumption - 134 l/min; Minimum hose size - 8 mm; Nipple 1/4''.

catalogue.name: Gasoline compressor tester kit
catalogue.description: A set with a 3-piece gasoline engine compression indicator in a case is a device that allows you to measure the pressure in the cylinders of a car engine. It consists of a pressure gauge, a rigid clamping adapter-transition 150 mm and a set of adapters for various types of engines. The pressure gauge has a measurement range from 0 to 20 bar and a measurement accuracy of ± 0.25 bar. The rigid clamping adapter ensures reliable fastening of the indicator on the engine and prevents it from shifting during measurement. The set of adapters allows you to use the indicator for various types of gasoline engines, including engines with M14x1.25 and M18x1.5 threads. Each adapter has its own thread and is suitable only for a certain type of engine. The gasoline engine compression gauge is supplied in a case for easy storage and transportation.

catalogue.description: Paint sprayer with an upper plastic tank, pressure regulator and additional nozzle (600 ml, 1.4 / 1.7 mm, 2.0 - 4.0 Bar, torch 180-250 mm, 400 l / min). Paint sprayers are one of the most common tools for applying paint to various surfaces. They allow you to evenly apply paint to the surface, which ensures high-quality coating and saves time. The paint sprayer has the following characteristics:  - Upper plastic tank - this means that the paint is supplied to the spray gun through the top valve, which facilitates the filling process and provides more accurate paint dosing.  - Pressure regulator - allows you to adjust the air pressure, which affects the spray speed and coating quality.  - Additional nozzle is a replaceable attachment that allows you to change the shape of the torch and adjust the spray width. Torch 180-250 mm. 400 l/min is the spray gun's performance, which is measured in liters per minute. The higher the performance, the faster you can apply paint to a larger surface area.

catalogue.name: 30m Laser distance measure
catalogue.description: The laser rangefinder is a laser tape measure that can measure in meters, feet and inches. The measurement accuracy of up to 3 mm will allow you to work with greater accuracy at distances of up to 30 meters. The rangefinder is equipped with a convenient display with backlight. The rangefinder is also equipped with a built-in memory for saving measurement results. The rangefinder has a function that calculates distances in real time, which is especially useful when determining regular distances. A set for returning disc brake pistons is used in the repair and maintenance of disc brake calipers of passenger cars. The principle of operation of this tool is based on the effect of combining two forces, rotational, perpendicular to the axis of rotation of the piston and axial, to return the piston of the working cylinder of the brake caliper to its original position.

catalogue.name: Flexible hose plier
catalogue.description: The manual mechanical riveter in a blister is a lever-type tool that allows you to connect metal elements with a total thickness of up to 10 mm in conditions where the use of welding and threaded fasteners is technically impossible or ineffective. It is designed to connect various sheet materials made of metal, wood, dense fabrics and other materials. The connection is carried out by through mounting of the fastening element - rivet. The riveter is pull-out, equipped with adapters for rivets with a diameter of 2.4 mm, 3.2 mm, 4.0 mm, 4.8 mm, grabs the rod and pulls it, forming a closing head. The 250 mm long body is made of cast steel, the handle has rubber profiled pads for comfortable holding. Adapters for rivets are located in the riveter body. There is a special key in the handle, with which you can easily and quickly change the adapters for rivets. The riveter has a movable handle that serves as a power lever and a fixed handle that provides support. It is also equipped with a wire loop that holds the handles together, which is convenient for storage. The principle of its operation is as follows: the force applied by the user to the handle of the tool is transmitted to the working mechanism, which installs the rivet element in the hole. The tool is used mainly for construction purposes in everyday life, in production and in repair shops. For service stations, garages and homes.

catalogue.name: Hand nut riveter gun 8" (L-210mm, adapters: М3, М4, М5, М6)

The pull-out riveter grabs the rod and pulls it, forming a closing head. It is made of a cast steel body, the handle has rubber profiled pads for comfortable holding. The kit includes a special key with which you can easily and quickly change the adapters for rivets. The riveter has a movable handle, which serves as a power lever and a fixed handle, providing support. It is also equipped with a wire loop that holds the handles together, which is convenient for storage. The connection is made by through-mounting the fastener - a rivet. Designed to connect various sheet materials made of metal, wood, dense fabrics and other materials.Rivet diameter: M3, M4, M5, M6.Length 210 mm.

catalogue.description: Compressor hose, rubber, reinforced air, with fittings 10 mm x 16 mm, 10 m is used to connect a pneumatic tool to a compressor when working with compressed air. The air hose is made of reinforced rubber, resistant to wear. The polymer shell can withstand repeated use without ruptures, thereby ensuring tightness and long-term operation. The high-pressure pneumatic hose is equipped with additional protection in the form of steel springs that prevent the hose from breaking at the attachment points, the inner diameter is 10 mm and the outer diameter is 16 mm. catalogue.name: Cordless impact wrench 1/2“
catalogue.description: The cordless impact wrench with reverse is designed for screwing and unscrewing any type of fasteners using the impact-pulse method. Impact wrenches, the energy source for which are batteries, are used for autonomous work with fasteners of varying complexity. The idle speed is adjusted from 0 to 1550 rpm. 2 batteries, voltage 20 V, capacity 5.0 Ah, type Li-ion. Landing square (outer square) 1/2" one half of an inch. Impact frequency 0-1900 bpm. Maximum tightening torque 1356 Nm. Maximum loosening torque 1898 Nm.Speed ​​adjustment depends on the force of pressing the trigger. The kit includes a hanging bracket that allows you to securely attach the impact wrench to your waist belt for carrying it and provides convenience when working at height. The impact wrench is equipped with LED backlighting, thanks to which you can freely work in low light conditions. The tool is equipped with an ergonomic handle with a special anti-slip coating. The kit includes a set of 3 impact heads: 17 mm, 19 mm, 21 mm. CR-MO chrome-molybdenum steel. Charger 230 V, 50 Hz. The set is supplied in a durable plastic case with a folding handle.

catalogue.name: 2 Jaw bearing puller 2"
catalogue.description: Bearing puller with two jaws and locking (grip range 8-40 mm)A bearing puller is a special device that makes it easy to remove and replace bearings, rings and gears. It consists of gripping paws and a metal rod. The gripping distance can be easily changed due to the movable joint. The most effective way to dismantle rolling bearings is to use a mechanical puller. A mechanical puller ensures that there is no damage to either the bearings or the surfaces adjacent to them during dismantling, since damage to the bearings entails its complete replacement. This tool is used in auto repair shops, service stations, and by car owners for preventive and repair work on car maintenance. When replacing bearings, pullers are an indispensable device that makes it possible to compress and safely dismantle the bearing. The tool is made of high-quality steel. Due to this, the puller is able to withstand increased loads.

catalogue.name: Impact open wrench 36mm
catalogue.description: The 36 mm single-ended reinforced open-end impact wrench is used to tighten or loosen threaded connections in various industrial fields. Its reinforced design allows it to be used in conditions where it is not possible to use a long lever. The wrench is equipped with a handle with an impact end that does not vibrate and eliminates the possibility of bending. This ensures accuracy and convenience when working with the tool. The working surface is designed for impact effects in order to increase the force when working with tight fasteners; it can be used to loosen and tighten threaded fasteners. Made of high-strength chromium-molybdenum alloy (Cro-Mo). It is characterized by wear resistance and anti-corrosion properties.

Each adapter has its own thread and is suitable only for a certain type of engine. The gasoline engine compression gauge is supplied in a case for easy storage and transportation.

catalogue.name: Petrol engine compression tester set
catalogue.description: A set with an 8-piece gasoline engine compression indicator in a case. It is a professional tool for determining the pressure in the cylinders of a gasoline engine. It consists of pressure gauges with a measurement range of 0-21 bar and an accuracy of ±0.25 bar, rigid clamping adapters and adapters with various threaded connections (M10, M12, M14, M18). Thanks to this set, you can quickly and conveniently measure the pressure in any gasoline engine. All tools are in a durable case, which ensures ease of storage and transportation of the set.

catalogue.name: Inflator tire pressure gun
catalogue.description: A tire inflation gun is a compressor attachment that allows you to connect the source to the receiver. However, this device is designed not only to connect the compressor to the tire, but also to supply compressed air, which is important to consider in order to avoid excess pressure. Flexible hose: length 340 mm; (outer Ø 11 mm, inner Ø 8 mm.) The pressure gauge body is protected by a rubber casing; Analog pressure gauge (Ø75 mm); Pressure 0-8.5 Bar; Pressure relief valve available. The high-quality tip is made of brass and equipped with a reliable clamp (clip). Provides a long service life. Ergonomic handle - comfortable to work with. Used in tire shops, service stations, workshops, garages.
